attributes.action: cancel the state funeral of margaret thatcher
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is an insult to the millions that the thatcher regime ruined. How dare the government waste 3 million on a state funeral. She deserves nothing!!
I for one will celebrate the day she dies

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
